TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyEventHandler(object sender, KeyEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyEventArgs)
public delegate void KeyEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, KeyEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: O objeto em que o manipulador de eventos está anexado.

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: Representa o método que manipulará os eventos roteados e , bem como eventos de visualização e anexados relacionados.

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este delegado é usado com os seguintes eventos anexados:This delegate is used with the following attached events: - - - - Este delegado também é usado com os seguintes eventos roteados em elementos de base.This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements. Esses eventos roteados encaminham os eventos anexados listados anteriormente para torná-las mais acessível para o modelo de elemento geral em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - Os eventos anexados e os eventos roteado de elemento base compartilham seus dados de evento e bolha e túnel versões dos eventos roteados também compartilham dados de evento.The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. Isso pode afetar as características manipuladas do evento conforme ela se desloca a rota de evento.This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. Para obter detalhes, consulte [visão geral de entrada](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples O exemplo a seguir verifica se a chave associada ao evento é o chave.The following example checks whether the key associated with the event is the key. [!code-csharp[keydown#KeyDownSample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyDown/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keydownsample)] [!code-vb[keydown#KeyDownSample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyDown/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#keydownsample)]
